name: 比利·杰克·哈洛
name_full: 比利·杰克·哈洛 Billy Jack Harlow
introduction: Within the movie industry, he is most proud of making many great friends and working with Bruce Willis and his manager, Stephen Eads, in three of his last action movies before Bruce retired. It was a humbling and awesome experience.Outside the movie industry, he is most proud of his time with the Navy's Engineering Mobile Training Team, an elite group of senior enlisted engineers who trained all engineers.
